verses.verse: מִזְמ֖וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> to bring to remembrance יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay בְּקֶצְפְּךָ֥ <S%H7110><s%> me not in thy wrath תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי <S%H3198><s%> rebuke וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ <S%H2534><s%> me in thy hot displeasure תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3256><s%> neither chasten

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חִ֭צֶּיךָ <S%H2671><s%> For thine arrows נִ֣חֲתוּ <S%H5181><s%> stick fast בִ֑י וַתִּנְחַ֖ת <S%H5181><s%> presseth me sore עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in me and thy hand

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There מְתֹ֣ם <S%H4974><s%> [There is] no soundness בִּ֭בְשָׂרִי <S%H1320><s%> in my flesh מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because זַעְמֶ֑ךָ <S%H2195><s%> of thine anger אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> is no שָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> neither [is there any] rest בַּ֝עֲצָמַ֗י <S%H6106><s%> in my bones מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> because חַטָּאתִֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> of my sin

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For עֲ֭וֹנֹתַי <S%H5771><s%> For mine iniquities עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> are gone over רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> mine head כְּמַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> burden כָ֝בֵ֗ד <S%H3515><s%> as an heavy יִכְבְּד֥וּ <S%H3513><s%> they are too heavy מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> too
הִבְאִ֣ישׁוּ <S%H887><s%> stink נָ֭מַקּוּ <S%H4743><s%> [and] are corrupt חַבּוּרֹתָ֑י <S%H2250><s%> My wounds מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> because אִוַּלְתִּֽי׃ <S%H200><s%> of my foolishness

נַעֲוֵ֣יתִי <S%H5753><s%> I am troubled שַׁחֹ֣תִי <S%H7817><s%> I am bowed down עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> over מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day קֹדֵ֥ר <S%H6937><s%> mourning הִלָּֽכְתִּי׃ <S%H1980><s%> I go

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כְ֭סָלַי <S%H3689><s%> For my loins מָלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> are filled נִקְלֶ֑ה <S%H7033><s%> with a loathsome וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מְ֝תֹ֗ם <S%H4974><s%> [disease] and [there is] no soundness בִּבְשָׂרִֽי׃ <S%H1320><s%> in my flesh

נְפוּג֣וֹתִי <S%H6313><s%> I am feeble וְנִדְכֵּ֣יתִי <S%H1794><s%> broken עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and sore שָׁ֝אַ֗גְתִּי <S%H7580><s%> I have roared מִֽנַּהֲמַ֥ת <S%H5100><s%> by reason of the disquietness לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> of my heart

אֲ‍ֽדֹנָי <S%H136><s%> Lord נֶגְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5048><s%> is before כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תַּאֲוָתִ֑י <S%H8378><s%> all my desire וְ֝אַנְחָתִ֗י <S%H585><s%> [is] before thee and my groaning מִמְּךָ֥ <S%H4480><s%> at לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not נִסְתָּֽרָה׃ <S%H5641><s%> is not hid

לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> My heart סְ֭חַרְחַר <S%H5503><s%> panteth עֲזָבַ֣נִי <S%H5800><s%> faileth כֹחִ֑י <S%H3581><s%> my strength וְֽאוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> me as for the light עֵינַ֥י <S%H5869><s%> of mine eyes גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even הֵ֝֗ם <S%H1992><s%> it אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> also is gone אִתִּֽי׃ <S%H854><s%> for

אֹֽהֲבַ֨י ׀ <S%H157><s%> My lovers וְרֵעַ֗י <S%H7453><s%> and my friends מִנֶּ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> aloof from נִגְעִ֣י <S%H5061><s%> my sore יַעֲמֹ֑דוּ <S%H5975><s%> stand וּ֝קְרוֹבַ֗י <S%H7138><s%> and my kinsmen מֵרָחֹ֥ק <S%H7350><s%> afar off עָמָֽדוּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> stand

וַיְנַקְשׁ֤וּ ׀ <S%H5367><s%> lay snares מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י <S%H1245><s%> They also that seek נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> after my life וְדֹרְשֵׁ֣י <S%H1875><s%> [for me] and they that seek רָ֭עָתִי <S%H7451><s%> my hurt דִּבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> speak הַוּ֑וֹת <S%H1942><s%> mischievous things וּ֝מִרְמ֗וֹת <S%H4820><s%> deceits כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day יֶהְגּֽוּ׃ <S%H1897><s%> and imagine

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I כְ֭חֵרֵשׁ <S%H2795><s%> But I as a deaf לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> [man] heard וּ֝כְאִלֵּ֗ם <S%H483><s%> not and [I was] as a dumb man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יִפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> [that] openeth פִּֽיו׃ <S%H6310><s%> not his mouth

וָאֱהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> Thus I was as a man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שֹׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> that heareth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> are no בְּ֝פִ֗יו <S%H6310><s%> not and in whose mouth תּוֹכָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H8433><s%> [are] no reproofs

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְךָ֣ יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God הוֹחָ֑לְתִּי <S%H3176><s%> do I hope אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You תַ֝עֲנֶ֗ה <S%H6030><s%> thou wilt hear אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> O Lord אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> For I said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> [Hear me] lest [otherwise] they should rejoice לִ֑י בְּמ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> slippeth רַ֝גְלִ֗י <S%H7272><s%> over me when my foot עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> against הִגְדִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H1431><s%> they magnify

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I לְצֶ֣לַע <S%H6761><s%> to halt נָכ֑וֹן <S%H3559><s%> For I [am] ready וּמַכְאוֹבִ֖י <S%H4341><s%> and my sorrow נֶגְדִּ֣י <S%H5048><s%> before תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> [is] continually
כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֲוֹנִ֥י <S%H5771><s%> mine iniquity אַגִּ֑יד <S%H5046><s%> For I will declare אֶ֝דְאַ֗ג <S%H1672><s%> I will be sorry מֵֽחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> for my sin

וְֽ֭אֹיְבַי <S%H341><s%> But mine enemies חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> [are] lively עָצֵ֑מוּ <S%H6105><s%> [and] they are strong וְרַבּ֖וּ <S%H7231><s%> are multiplied שֹׂנְאַ֣י <S%H8130><s%> and they that hate שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> me wrongfully

וּמְשַׁלְּמֵ֣י <S%H7999><s%> They also that render רָ֭עָה <S%H7451><s%> evil תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> because טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> for good יִ֝שְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <S%H7853><s%> are mine adversaries תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> because [רְדֹופִי־ כ] (רָֽדְפִי־ <S%H7291><s%> follow טֽוֹב׃ <S%H7291><s%> because I follow ק)

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּֽעַזְבֵ֥נִי <S%H5800><s%> Forsake יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> me not O LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> O my God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּרְחַ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> be not far מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at
ח֥וּשָׁה <S%H2363><s%> Make haste לְעֶזְרָתִ֑י <S%H5833><s%> to help אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> me O Lord תְּשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H8668><s%> my salvation
